        Apply Promotion after expanding the combo box - DW and Non DW Application
        Parameters:
        btnexpndMenu - : Expand Menu WebElement
        txtPromotion - : Promotion Text Box WebElement
        promoCode - : Promo Code (Ex: "HS100")
        btnApplyPromo - : Apply Promotion Button
        driver - : WebDriver Instance

      • deletePromotionAtPosition

        public static final void deletePromotionAtPosition(java.lang.String btnPromoDel,
                                                   java.lang.String promoPosition,
                                                   org.openqa.selenium.WebDriver driver)
        Delete desired promotion
        Parameters:
        btnPromoDel - : Promotion Delete String [CSS Selector]
        promoPosition - : $ symbol in btnPromoDel param will be replaced with this string. Ex: "1" - ul[class=''] li:nth-child(1) a
        driver - : WebDriver Instance
